quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
author: Peter T. McIntyre

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement.
author: Helen Keller

quote: With realization of one’s own potential and self‑confidence in one’s ability, one can build a better world.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities!
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Our doubts are traitors, and make us lose the good we oft might win, by fearing to attempt.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Because one believes in oneself, one doesn’t try to convince others.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Confidence is contagious. So is lack of confidence.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Self-confidence is the memory of success.
author: David Storey

quote: I am the greatest, I said that even before I knew I was.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Self-trust is the first secret of success.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Trust yourself. Create the kind of self that you will be happy to live with all your life.
author: Golda Meir

quote: It is confidence in our bodies, minds, and spirits that allows us to keep looking for new adventures.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
author: Les Brown
